title: Horizontal swiping
creator: fahri.uzun
content: Following recent updates, the functionality of horizontal swiping for actions such as marking as read or deleting mail has exhibited inconsistent behavior. Specifically, the intended swipe gestures frequently result in unintended vertical scrolling.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/139.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android

title: Release in Google Play Store
creator: hhintzen
content:
I know there are several ways to get updates... But: What is the expected delay with which a (Github-)"release" becomes visible in Google Play Store?

(I know about Google's approval procedures, "staged rollout", and so on... Just want to know an estimation of shortest and longest delay, before I can get an update via Google PlayStore...)
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) SamsungBrowser/28.0 Chrome/130.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android
